name: Tufts University
description: Founded in 1852, Tufts University is recognized among the premier universities in the United States. Tufts enjoys a global reputation for academic excellence and for the preparation of socially engaged students as leaders for a changing world. Recognized by the Carnegie Foundation as a "RU/VH: Research University (very high research activity)" in basic and clinical sciences, Tufts provides programs that foster interdisciplinary innovation and collaboration in liberal arts, environmental and life sciences, engineering, and international affairs.
